scripts.dev: NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation node server.js & NODE_OPTIONS=--no-deprecation BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:3001 next dev --turbopack
scripts.postinstall: node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path');function r(p){try{return require.resolve(p);}catch(e){}}const candidates=['pdfjs-dist/legacy/build/pdf.worker.js','pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.min.mjs','pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.mjs','pdfjs-dist/build/pdf.worker.js'];const src=candidates.map(r).find(Boolean);if(!src){throw new Error('pdfjs worker not found in known paths: '+candidates.join(', '));}const dest=path.join('public','pdf.worker.js');fs.mkdirSync('public',{recursive:true});fs.copyFileSync(src,dest);console.log('Copied',src,'to',dest);"
